title: Bitsar
author: Bitsar
content: Best, lowest prices, 0.35% rate, 24 hours a day. We never store your property.MEMBERSHIP/AFFILIATE PROGRAM:Sign up for an account and join us. And you'll earn 40% profit from every transaction your customers make!Three easy steps to start making money:1. Register an account and get a member exclusive link.2. Promote your unique link, people click on it to transact.3. Get 40% profit from every transaction made by your customers!Advantage-Completely transparent-All transactions made by your customers are instantly shown in your affiliate account-High profit-For each user you refer to trade, you will receive a 40% commission commission.-Low withdrawal amount-Minimum withdrawal amount is only 0.001 BTCWhat customers will get:-Excellent service quality-Get all currencies on the market for less than $2-Very good price with no hidden fees-Have the strength to come to the fastest transaction, no account, worry-free, faster than light.-Minimum purchase amount as low as $2 with no upper limit.-Transparent and honest exchange rates. no hidden fees.-Extremely fast transaction speed. Most transactions take 40 seconds or less.-Please contact: cs@bitsar.com
